title: Vertically align input elements, reduce input padding, hide message IDs visually

requirements.text: In the chat input area (MessageInput component), vertically center-align all elements — the text input field and all action buttons — so they share the same horizontal axis.

quotes: Vertically align the input area elements (buttons + text input) so they're centered on the same axis

acceptanceCriteria: The text input and all buttons in the chat input bar are vertically centered on the same axis
No other layout or styling changes are introduced

requirements.text: Reduce vertical padding in the chat input area (MessageInput component) to give more vertical space to the chat messages area above it.

quotes: Reduce vertical padding in the chat input area to give more room to the chat messages

acceptanceCriteria: The chat input area has less vertical padding than before
More vertical space is available for the messages list
No other style changes are introduced

requirements.text: Visually hide message ID labels in the chat message bubbles (MessageBubble component) so they are not visible to users, while preserving their DOM presence with the correct anchor IDs so that share links and URL-based anchoring remain fully functional.

quotes: Hide message IDs visually while keeping share links and URL anchoring fully functional

acceptanceCriteria: Message ID text is not visible in the chat UI
Each message still has its anchor element in the DOM with the correct ID attribute
Navigating to a share link scrolls to and highlights the correct message
No other style or functionality changes are introduced

constraints: No other style or functionality changes beyond the three listed requirements
Share link and URL anchor functionality must remain fully intact after hiding message IDs
nonGoals: Changes to any component other than MessageInput and MessageBubble
Modifying message ID generation or storage logic
